speaker: Facebook posts
vclaim: ==History==Askandria Okasio Cortez of the United States has obtained a seat on the Financial Services Committee of the House of Representatives, but "its credit rating was 430 and had two closed check accounts, along with the expulsion of two mayors."
date: stated on January 16, 2019 in Facebook posts:
title: ∙ Fake rumors spread over Alexandria's level of credit, Okasio Cortez, bank accounts
text: The Republic of the United States has attracted much interest from Alexandria Ocacio-Cortez, D-NY, since its swearing-in earlier this month, with imaginary quotations attributed to or criticism of its college dance movements. Now, after securing a seat on the Financial Services Committee of the House of Representatives, the Internet calls for the management of its personal funds to question. Facebook, which appeared on January 16, published over 28,000 times and generated approximately 2,000 comments. We also found that several other copies of the claim were spread over the Internet without sources or any kind of evidence. The entire article says: "Congress Cortez, New York City, was selected to be on the Home Finance Committee, and her credit rating is 430. It was referred to as part of Facebook efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) We contacted the Facebook author for evidence, but we didn't get a response. On January 12, 2021, he wrote in an Instagram article saying that Joe Biden remained silent about the violence in Black Lives-Mite protests. • On January 16, 2012, we did not find any information to record or support the idea that Ocacio-Cortez had multiple closed audit accounts or had been expelled. From the many insights that I wrote about over the past year, we know that she helped support her family by working in multiple jobs, and that she was criticized by some for not having substantial savings, but nothing comes close to these rumors. Furthermore, a person ' s credit rating cannot be obtained without his or her written consent, in accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act, and therefore the originator of the rumours is unlikely to obtain such information. Our examination of public records databases did not refer to any eviction or other problems related to law enforcement property or housing (there were no provisions, privileges or bankruptcy). According to the April 2018 financial disclosure report, the only liability on the list is a federal student loan. "No, that's not true, no credit mark is not 430 and she has no Sharif evacuations," said the Ocacio Cortez spokesman. While Okasio-Cortez had to work in two jobs in the past to help support her family and currently had one student loan, there was no evidence to support her expulsion at all, the closure of bank accounts or the low degree of credit. We're assessing this allegation pants on fire! Sharing the facts 2019-01-23 16:55:42 UTC PoliticsFact 1 1 7 Political Factoring: Pants on Fire New. Ascandreany Ocasio-Cortez has obtained a seat on the Financial Services Committee of the House of Representatives but "its degree of credit is 430 and has two closed bank accounts, together with two evictions as mayor."
